text:
<@U0W7D64LC> <@U12KFP7JN> ：
I went through the Art Auction Demo, and found  a bug there. auction/art/artchaincode/art_app.go:1413 :
The invoke of chaincode would be executed on multi validators. However, the output of time.Now() would not be the same on all validators.  Is that valid?
```
    bidTime := time.Now().Format("2006-01-02 15:04:05")

    aBid = Bid{args[0], args[1], args[2], args[3], args[4], args[5], bidTime}

    fmt.Println("CreateBidObject() : Bid Object : ", aBid)
```
<@U0ULQ2G5V> <@U0W7D64LC> <@U12KFP7JN> : IFAR has an interesting breakout of the benefits of provenance for artwork - <https://www.ifar.org/provenance_guide.php>

attachments.title: International Foundation for Art Research (IFAR)-Provenance Guide
attachments.text: International Foundation for Art Research - Until recently, provenance research was the province of art scholars dealing primarily with issues of attribution and authenticity. But recent legal claims by heirs of Holocaust victims whose art works were looted or otherwise misappropriated by the Nazis, and claims by foreign
attachments.fallback: International Foundation for Art Research (IFAR)-Provenance Guide

text: Cool neat stuff.... I will also work to see if can get another demo.... I will be on the road next week and will miss the meeting but Mohan and team can join
